'''Perch Proliferating Organism''' is a special enemy encountered during Phase 2 of the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] Weekly Boss. One is also encountered earlier during {{Quest|What Shape Does the Self Hold}}.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|dendro_res=50%|hp_ratio=2.4|hp_type=2|hide_atk=1|hide_notes=1}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Perch Proliferating Organism

|name_1      = Barrier
|desc_1      = Spawns barriers in front of or around the player to restrict movement but does not deal DMG.
|file_1_2    = Perch Proliferating Organism Barrier 2

|name_2      = Teleport
|desc_2      = If the player is too far away, teleports to the player.
}}
